widget.name: Progress Button
widget.description: Small react component that displays a button. It shows a progress circle onclick and visualizes whether the action succeeded or not

property.caption: Duration success
property.description: Time (in ms) how long the success mark will be shown

property.caption: Duration error
property.description: Time (in ms) how long the error mark will be shown

property.caption: Button disabled
property.description: Boolean attribute that is used to disable the button, set to true to disable the button

property.caption: On click action
property.description: Action to trigger when button is clicked

property.caption: Action feedback
property.description: String attribute that has to be set within the on click action to provide feedback to the user. It can be set to 'error', 'success', or 'none'. Note: This attribute is also used and changed by the widget.

property.caption: On success action
property.description: Action to be called when the 'Action feedback' was set to success. This action will be called after the 'Duration success'

property.caption: On error action
property.description: Action to be called when the 'Action feedback' was set to error. This action will be called after the 'Duration error'
